title: Trouble logging in Mac - Help!
body:
Hey, never had any problems with my Mac and league, but today I haven't been able to open it. It kept getting stuck on the logo and then closing about 20 seconds later. Eventually it opened and has done about a 4000mb patch and now is getting stuck at 84% with 'Applied Patches'. Has anyone else experienced this, or does anyone have a fix for it?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Haha, I was waiting for this..
Maybe its a sign to get PC
